20101225023123.000|20101225023125.000|CC1|IN THE FUTURE, IT WILL BE THAT  
20101225023125.000|20101225023128.000|CC1|THE TREE DIES.                  
20101225023128.000|20101225023129.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIEVES TARGET     
20101225023129.000|20101225023130.000|CC1|OLDER GROWTH TREES AS WELL.     
20101225023130.000|20101225023132.000|CC1|POACHERS TYPICALLY SCALE A TREE,
20101225023132.000|20101225023134.000|CC1|STRIP IT FOR ITS BRANCHES AND   
20101225023134.000|20101225023135.000|CC1|THEN SELL JUST THE TIPS OF THE  
20101225023135.000|20101225023139.000|CC1|BOUGHS TO WHOLESALERS.          
20101225023139.000|20101225023148.000|CC1|>> I'M STILL IN SHOCK JUST TO   
20101225023148.000|20101225023149.000|CC1|SEE THE DAMAGE THEY'RE WILLING  
20101225023149.000|20101225023150.000|CC1|TO LEAVE BEHIND JUST TO GET A

20101225023152.000|20101225023153.000|CC1|WOODS ARE BECOMING A DANGEROUS

20101225023155.000|20101225023155.000|CC1|>> THEY TAKE THE GUN AND THEY

20101225023243.000|20101225023244.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT'S ALMOST        
20101225023244.000|20101225023245.000|CC1|IMPOSSIBLE TO TABULATE JUST HOW

20101225024718.000|20101225024719.000|CC1|THE CHURCH OR THE NOBILITY.     
20101225024719.000|20101225024722.000|CC1|>> Paul:  HARVARD'S MIKE        
20101225024722.000|20101225024723.000|CC1|SHEER'S WRITTEN A CLASSIC ON    
20101225024723.000|20101225024725.000|CC1|CLASSICAL MUSIC AND ECONOMICS.  
20101225024725.000|20101225024727.000|CC1|QUARTER NOTES AND BANKS NOTES.  
20101225024727.000|20101225024729.000|CC1|OPERA WAS THE ROAD TO

20101225024733.000|20101225024734.000|CC1|>> THE COMPOSERS COMPETED AS    
20101225024734.000|20101225024737.000|CC1|FREELANCERS TO HAVE THEIR       
20101225024737.000|20101225024739.000|CC1|COMPOSITIONS CHOSEN TO BE       
20101225024739.000|20101225024743.000|CC1|OPERAS.                         
20101225024743.000|20101225024745.000|CC1|>> Paul:  HANDEL ON ROYAL       
20101225024745.000|20101225024747.000|CC1|RETAINER IN LONDON JUMPED IN TO 
20101225024747.000|20101225024754.000|CC1|THE GAUGE ACCORDING TO M.MIT.   
20101225024754.000|20101225024756.000|CC1|>> HE PROBABLY WOULD HAVE GOTTEN
20101225024756.000|20101225024800.000|CC1|FLAT FEE FOR WRITING THE OPERA. 
20101225024800.000|20101225024802.000|CC1|AND THAT PROBABLY WAS ABOUT 200 
20101225024802.000|20101225024803.000|CC1|POUNDS.                         
20101225024803.000|20101225024805.000|CC1|AND HE WOULD HAVE HAD A BENEFIT 
20101225024805.000|20101225024806.000|CC1|NIGHT SO HE COULD TAKE THE BOX
